verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> way·ḏab·bêr said ( Feasts and Sabbaths) ( 20 23:14-19) יְהוָ֖ה 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) Then the LORD אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) to מֹשֶׁ֥ה 4872 N-proper-ms ( mō·šeh) Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ 559 Prep-l│V-Qal-Inf ( lê·mōr) ...,

דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> dab·bêr “ Speak אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> bə·nê the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> wə·’ā·mar·tā and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> ’ă·lê·hem to them, מוֹעֲדֵ֣י <WH4150> mō·w·‘ă·ḏê the feasts יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- that תִּקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> tiq·rə·’ū you are to proclaim אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> ’ō·ṯām - מִקְרָאֵ֣י <WH4744> miq·rā·’ê assemblies. קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš as sacred אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> ’êl·leh ‘ These הֵ֖ם <WH1992> hêm are מוֹעֲדָֽי׃ <WH4150> mō·w·‘ă·ḏāy My appointed feasts,

שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <WH8337> šê·šeṯ For six יָמִים֮ <WH3117> yā·mîm days תֵּעָשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> tê·‘ā·śeh may be done, מְלָאכָה֒ <WH4399> mə·lā·ḵāh work וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> ū·ḇay·yō·wm day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> haš·šə·ḇî·‘î but the seventh שַׁבַּ֤ת <WH7676> šab·baṯ is a Sabbath שַׁבָּתוֹן֙ <WH7677> šab·bā·ṯō·wn of complete rest, מִקְרָא־ <WH4744> miq·rā- assembly. קֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš a day of sacred כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- any מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> mə·lā·ḵāh work; לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō You must not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> ṯa·‘ă·śū do שַׁבָּ֥ת <WH7676> šab·bāṯ is a Sabbath הִוא֙ <WH1931> hî it לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD. בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> bə·ḵōl wherever מֽוֹשְׁבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃פ <WH4186> mō·wō·šə·ḇō·ṯê·ḵem you live,

( Passover and the Feast of Unleavened Bread) ( 20 12:14-28 ;  40 28:16-25 ;  50 16:1-8 ) אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> ’êl·leh These מוֹעֲדֵ֣י <WH4150> mō·w·‘ă·ḏê appointed feasts, יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh are the LORD’s מִקְרָאֵ֖י <WH4744> miq·rā·’ê assemblies קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš the sacred אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- - תִּקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> tiq·rə·’ū you are to proclaim אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> ’ō·ṯām - בְּמוֹעֲדָֽם׃ <WH4150> bə·mō·w·‘ă·ḏām at their appointed times.

בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> ba·ḥō·ḏeš month. הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <WH7223> hā·ri·šō·wn of the first בְּאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> bə·’ar·bā·‘āh on the fourteenth עָשָׂ֛ר <WH6240> ‘ā·śār ... ( Hebrew begins between the two evenings of the fourteenth) לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> la·ḥō·ḏeš day בֵּ֣ין <WH996> bên begins at הָעַרְבָּ֑יִם <WH6153> hā·‘ar·bā·yim twilight פֶּ֖סַח <WH6453> pe·saḥ The Passover לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD

וּבַחֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <WH2568> ū·ḇa·ḥă·miš·šāh On the fifteenth עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> ‘ā·śār ... יוֹם֙ <WH3117> yō·wm day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> la·ḥō·ḏeš month [begins] הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz·zeh of the same חַ֥ג <WH2282> ḥaḡ the Feast הַמַּצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> ham·maṣ·ṣō·wṯ of Unleavened Bread ( That is, the seven-day period after the Passover during which no leaven may be eaten; see .) לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD. שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> šiḇ·‘aṯ For seven יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> yā·mîm days מַצּ֥וֹת <WH4682> maṣ·ṣō·wṯ unleavened bread. תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> tō·ḵê·lū you must eat

בַּיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> bay·yō·wm day הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> hā·ri·šō·wn On the first מִקְרָא־ <WH4744> miq·rā- assembly; קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš a sacred יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih·yeh you are to hold לָכֶ֑ם Prep│2mp ( lā·ḵem) כָּל־ 3605 N-msc ( kāl-) any מְלֶ֥אכֶת 4399 N-fsc ( mə·le·ḵeṯ) work. עֲבֹדָ֖ה 5656 N-fs ( ‘ă·ḇō·ḏāh) regular לֹ֥א 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō) you are not תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ 6213 V-Qal-Imperf-2mp ( ṯa·‘ă·śū) to do

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֥ם <WH7126> wə·hiq·raḇ·tem you are to present אִשֶּׁ֛ה <WH801> ’iš·šeh an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD. שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> šiḇ·‘aṯ For seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> yā·mîm days בַּיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> bay·yō·wm day הַשְּׁבִיעִי֙ <WH7637> haš·šə·ḇî·‘î On the seventh מִקְרָא־ <WH4744> miq·rā- assembly; קֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš there shall be a sacred כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- any מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> mə·le·ḵeṯ work. ’” עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> ‘ă·ḇō·ḏāh regular לֹ֥א <WH3808> lō you must not תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃פ <WH6213> ṯa·‘ă·śū do
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> way·ḏab·bêr said ( The Feast of Firstfruits) יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> lê·mōr ...,

דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> dab·bêr “ Speak אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- to בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> bə·nê the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> wə·’ā·mar·tā and say, אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> ’ă·lê·hem ... כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- ‘ When תָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> ṯā·ḇō·’ū you enter אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- ... הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that אֲנִי֙ <WH589> ’ă·nî I נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> nō·ṯên am giving לָכֶ֔ם Prep│2mp ( lā·ḵem) you וּקְצַרְתֶּ֖ם 7114 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConjPerf-2mp ( ū·qə·ṣar·tem) and you reap אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - קְצִירָ֑הּ 7105 N-msc│3fs ( qə·ṣî·rāh) its harvest, וַהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם 935 Conj-w│V-Hifil-ConjPerf-2mp ( wa·hă·ḇê·ṯem) you are to bring אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - עֹ֛מֶר 6016 N-msc ( ‘ō·mer) a sheaf רֵאשִׁ֥ית 7225 N-fsc ( rê·šîṯ) of the firstfruits קְצִירְכֶ֖ם 7105 N-msc│2mp ( qə·ṣî·rə·ḵem) of your harvest. אֶל־ 413 Prep ( ’el-) to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ 3548 Art│N-ms ( hak·kō·hên) the priest

וְהֵנִ֧יף <WH5130> wə·hê·nîp̄ And he shall wave אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָעֹ֛מֶר <WH6016> hā·‘ō·mer the sheaf לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lip̄·nê before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD לִֽרְצֹנְכֶ֑ם <WH7522> lir·ṣō·nə·ḵem so that it may be accepted on your behalf; מִֽמָּחֳרַת֙ <WH4283> mim·mā·ḥo·raṯ on the day after הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> haš·šab·bāṯ the Sabbath. יְנִיפֶ֖נּוּ <WH5130> yə·nî·p̄en·nū is to wave it הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> hak·kō·hên the priest

וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֕ם <WH6213> wa·‘ă·śî·ṯem you shall offer בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> bə·yō·wm On the day הֲנִֽיפְכֶ֖ם <WH5130> hă·nî·p̄ə·ḵem you wave אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הָעֹ֑מֶר <WH6016> hā·‘ō·mer the sheaf, כֶּ֣בֶשׂ <WH3532> ke·ḇeś lamb תָּמִ֧ים <WH8549> tā·mîm without blemish בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- a year-old שְׁנָת֛וֹ <WH8141> šə·nā·ṯōw ... לְעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> lə·‘ō·lāh as a burnt offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD,

וּמִנְחָתוֹ֩ <WH4503> ū·min·ḥā·ṯōw along with its grain offering שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> šə·nê of two-tenths of an ephah עֶשְׂרֹנִ֜ים <WH6241> ‘eś·rō·nîm ... סֹ֣לֶת <WH5560> sō·leṯ of fine flour ( Two-tenths of an ephah is approximately 4 dry quarts or 4.4 liters (probably about 5.1 pounds or 2.3 kilograms of flour); also in verse 17.) בְּלוּלָ֥ה <WH1101> bə·lū·lāh mixed בַשֶּׁ֛מֶן <WH8081> ḇaš·še·men with oil — אִשֶּׁ֥ה <WH801> ’iš·šeh an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD, רֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> rê·aḥ aroma — נִיחֹ֑חַ <WH5207> nî·ḥō·aḥ a pleasing וְנִסְכֹּ֥ה <WH5262> wə·nis·kōh and its drink offering יַ֖יִן <WH3196> ya·yin of wine. ( A quarter hin is approximately 0.97 quarts or 0.92 liters of wine.) רְבִיעִ֥ת <WH7243> rə·ḇî·‘iṯ of a quarter הַהִֽין׃ <WH1969> ha·hîn hin

וְלֶחֶם֩ <WH3899> wə·le·ḥem any bread וְקָלִ֨י <WH7039> wə·qā·lî or roasted וְכַרְמֶ֜ל <WH3759> wə·ḵar·mel or new grain לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō You must not תֹֽאכְל֗וּ <WH398> ṯō·ḵə·lū eat עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- until עֶ֙צֶם֙ <WH6106> ‘e·ṣem very הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> hay·yō·wm day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz·zeh the עַ֚ד <WH5704> ‘aḏ - הֲבִ֣יאֲכֶ֔ם <WH935> hă·ḇî·’ă·ḵem you have brought אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- this קָרְבַּ֖ן <WH7133> qā·rə·ban offering אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hê·ḵem to your God. חֻקַּ֤ת <WH2708> ḥuq·qaṯ statute עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> ‘ō·w·lām This is to be a permanent לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> lə·ḏō·rō·ṯê·ḵem for the generations to come, בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> bə·ḵōl wherever מֹשְׁבֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ס <WH4186> mō·šə·ḇō·ṯê·ḵem you live.

וּסְפַרְתֶּ֤ם <WH5608> ū·sə·p̄ar·tem you are to count off לָכֶם֙ Prep│2mp ( lā·ḵem) The Feast of Weeks 510 2:1-13 מִמָּחֳרַ֣ת 4283 Prep-m│N-fsc ( mim·mā·ḥo·raṯ) From the day after הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת 7676 Art│N-cs ( haš·šab·bāṯ) the Sabbath, מִיּוֹם֙ 3117 Prep-m│N-msc ( mî·yō·wm) the day הֲבִ֣יאֲכֶ֔ם 935 V-Hifil-Inf│2mp ( hă·ḇî·’ă·ḵem) you brought אֶת־ 853 DirObjM ( ’eṯ-) - עֹ֖מֶר 6016 N-msc ( ‘ō·mer) the sheaf הַתְּנוּפָ֑ה 8573 Art│N-fs ( hat·tə·nū·p̄āh) of the wave offering, שֶׁ֥בַע 7651 Number-fs ( še·ḇa‘) seven שַׁבָּת֖וֹת 7676 N-cp ( šab·bā·ṯō·wṯ) weeks. תְּמִימֹ֥ת 8549 Adj-fp ( tə·mî·mōṯ) full תִּהְיֶֽינָה׃ 1961 V-Qal-Imperf-3fp ( tih·ye·nāh)

עַ֣ד <WH5704> ‘aḏ until מִֽמָּחֳרַ֤ת <WH4283> mim·mā·ḥo·raṯ the day after הַשַּׁבָּת֙ <WH7676> haš·šab·bāṯ Sabbath, הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔ת <WH7637> haš·šə·ḇî·‘iṯ the seventh תִּסְפְּר֖וּ <WH5608> tis·pə·rū You shall count off חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> ḥă·miš·šîm fifty י֑וֹם <WH3117> yō·wm days וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֛ם <WH7126> wə·hiq·raḇ·tem and then present מִנְחָ֥ה <WH4503> min·ḥāh grain חֲדָשָׁ֖ה <WH2319> ḥă·ḏā·šāh an offering of new לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD.
